topics.body:
But yeah not to bum out the thread but yeah.

Devon the cool guy that played as "Gaston" at Disneyland died yesterday.

You know how? Launching fireworks off of his head at a party by freak accident. 

Jesus Christ dude. 

He'll be remembered as the best Gaston there was!

topics.body:
Just woke up from a nightmare
There was this mirror in the hallway closet I keep cleaning supplies in 
Whenever I would look at it I would see this old lady in a sleeping gown with pale blue skin, no lips and bright white eyes that sort of let of a black aura and she scared the shit out of me
And when I told my mom about her she was kind of coy about it 
Like she knew she was there and liked that I was scared
It was fucked up
Also for some reason I called her aunty grandma

So I guess uncle grandpa's wife isn't nearly as friendly.   


"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5599db146368727b3c000286#post_5599db146368727b3c000286
Shit dude
They're not gonna find a replacement that was nearly as good as him. 


"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5599db746368724f3d00111d#post_5599db746368724f3d00111d
!vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/wikiality/images/b/bf/BabySatanBKG.png/revision/latest?cb=20061009214827!
^ literally u
